title: Application process: coach unable to confirm belonging to a team
body_html:
According to a student's bug report, the team coaches were unable to confirm themselves through the UI after being added to a team. I investigated a little bit, and it seems that this fails for teams whose coaches were added prior to us introducing the "coach confirmation" (meaning, no confirmation_token was created).
I don't think too many teams are affected, but this is something we should keep in mind.

body:
According to a student's bug report, the team coaches were unable to confirm themselves through the UI after being added to a team. I investigated a little bit, and it seems that this fails for teams whose coaches were added prior to us introducing the "coach confirmation" (meaning, no `confirmation_token` was created). 
I don't think too many teams are affected, but this is something we should keep in mind.
